definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Percy: We better get some seltzer on that.
sentences.chinese: 我們去拿些蘇打水清洗下吧。

sentences.english: The machine used to sell soda water.
sentences.chinese: 這個機器以前是出售蘇打水的。

sentences.english: Try cutting your intake by replacing caffeinated sodas and coffee with non-caffeinated drinks.
sentences.chinese: 試着少飲用含咖啡因的蘇打水和咖啡飲料。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice , strain over fresh ice and top with soda water.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合所有原料，濾入冰塊，注入適量蘇打水。

sentences.english: We also have great salad as well as soda and iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 我們還供應一流的沙拉，蘇打水和冰茶。

sentences.english: The average American guzzles nearly a full gallon of soda every week.
sentences.chinese: 美國人平均每週要喝掉1加侖的蘇打水。

sentences.english: Rinse your mouth with water and soda.
Your idea of cutting back is less seltzer.
sentences.chinese: 你短路的想法是蘇打水再少一點。

sentences.english: Candy-filled vending machines and soda coolers are mostly gone.
sentences.chinese: 糖果和蘇打水滿自動售貨機冷卻器大多不見了。

sentences.english: Make a paste with water to clean up your sink that isn’t very abrasive.
sentences.chinese: 用蘇打水清洗洗碗池可使其更加光亮。

sentences.english: He spritzed a little soda in his drink.
sentences.chinese: 他往飲料裏噴了一點兒蘇打水。

sentences.english: Drink water or lemon water instead of juices and sodas.
sentences.chinese: 用純水或檸檬水來代替果汁和蘇打水。

sentences.english: If there's an unopened bottle of soda, that obviously goes back.
sentences.chinese: 如果那裏有一瓶未開封的蘇打水，那當然可以放回去。

sentences.english: The gas is mixed into the soda before the can is sealed.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳在汽水罐密封的情況下充滿了蘇打水。
